value:
$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Njörðr is dead, but...we're no closer
to having answers, are we?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Even with Njörðr gone, Gullveig and
the ruin she will bring seem beyond
our ability to stop...$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Pain|If there is no way to defeat Gullveig,
then I must ask this of you, children
of Midgard...$k$pPlease...kill me.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Seiðr, no! What are you saying!$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Anger|We can defeat Gullveig before she...
before I become her. This is the
only way.$k$pAs Gullveig said, the golden serpents
will keep me from taking my own life.$k$pBut you can do what I cannot.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|...$k$pIf we were to kill you, the cycle would
be broken. Gullvieg would...never
come into existence?$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Pain|That is what I believe.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Cool|...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Alfonse, we can't be seriously
considering this as an option...
Tell him, $Nu!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|If we kill Seiðr, Gullveig will never
have a chance to exist...$k$pWhich means the Gullveig that
exists with us in the present may
also disappear...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cry|Where are you going with
this, Alfonse?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|...However, she also might not.$k$pSince Gullveig already exists in the
present, she may continue existing
even if Seiðr dies...$k$pWhich would mean that not even
killing Seiðr could stop Gullveig.$k$p$Sbs8000|$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Pain|If even killing her before she is born
is not enough to stop her, then...what
hope do we have?$k$p$WmMEID_ネルトゥス,ch00_50_Nerthus_Normal,Face|My sweet, little children of Midgard.
It is just as I said, is it not?$k$p$Sbs1000|$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face|Lady Nerþuz...$k$p$SbpBGM_MNS_FE10_03,0|$WmMEID_ネルトゥス,ch00_50_Nerthus_Normal,Face|I warned you against returning
the Ár to Njörðr! You should have
heeded my advice...$k$pAlas, what is done cannot be undone.
All we can do is decide what we will
do next.$k$p$EFace_Cool|To that end, I am here to help.$k$p

$WmMEID_ネルトゥス,ch00_50_Nerthus_Normal,Face|Let's take a visit to Njörðr's treasure
vault. With his death, the seal should
be broken.$k$pThat is where he'd have kept my
precious Aurr... Once it's retrieved,
I can help you.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|What is this...Aurr?$k$p$WmMEID_ネルトゥス,ch00_50_Nerthus_Normal,Face_Pain|Something he took from me, and
the reason I took his Ár from him.$k$p$EFace|We have feuded since birth, always
a stark line between us, as the shore
divides the land and the sea.$k$pWhile he was alive, I had no way
to get my Aurr back. Since that is
no longer the case, let's hurry to it.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_MNS_FE12_04,0|$WmMEID_ネルトゥス,ch00_50_Nerthus_Normal,Face_Anger|It is as you said, children of Midgard...
The Golden Seer is not the same as
the Seiðr we have here with us.$k$pNot even killing Seiðr would stop
Gullveig, and Seiðr's death would
be meaningless.$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Pain|...$k$p$WmMEID_ネルトゥス,ch00_50_Nerthus_Normal,Face|So, try not to die just yet.$k$pAnd together we'll see an end
to Gullveig.$k$p$WmMPID_セイズ,ch00_46_Seith_F_Normal,Face_Pain|B-but it's impossible! That's the
whole reas—$k$p$WmMEID_ネルトゥス,ch00_50_Nerthus_Normal,Face|Just trust me!$k$p...Gullveig is not the root cause of the
problem we face—nor is it you.$k$pThe curse of the gold serpent is the
source of it all. That is where we
must strike.$k$p$Sbs150|
